name: A Walk Thorough History
description:
Another project I have created for my HND in Games Design.

Tour through the museum using mouse and keyboard. Click on the exhibits to get more information.

I would love feedback on the level design.

Thanks to Speed Tutor for the Inspect System

Models from Sketchfab:

Stonehenge by Remco Bronkhorst

Skara Brae by Dr Hugo Anderson-Whymark

Sussex Loop by The British Museum

Roundhouse by moforabbit

Maiden Castle by jaymie.james
